message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I am proposing a counteroffer of $950,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but  $950,000 is significantly below my minimum.  To make this work, I could come down to $1,050,000. This reflects the true value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I still need to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000 for the product.
